title: About
text:
I’m an ML engineer focused on representation learning and efficient training. This site is a notebook of algorithm notes and small demos.

Interests: contrastive/self-supervised learning, distillation, retrieval
LinkedIn: LinkedIn
Code: GitHub · Contact: bolatovichhh@gmail.com
